sentences.en: All admired his boldness in sailing into an enemy harbor to attack their ships.
sentences.cn: 他驾船驶进敌人港口攻击敌舰,大家对他的勇敢都很钦佩.

sentences.en: All you needed was luck and cunning and boldness.
sentences.cn: 只消有点子运气、狡猾和勇敢,这样的事情便能成功.

sentences.en: But he was attacked with increasing boldness and steadfastness.
sentences.cn: 但他却受到日益大胆和坚决的攻击.

sentences.en: Don't forget the boldness of his economic programme.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记他的经济方案非常大胆。

sentences.en: Einstein cannot be faulted for lack of boldness.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦决不会因为不够大胆而受到责备.

sentences.en: He bombarded her with many questions and she answered them with boldness.
sentences.cn: 他问了她许多问题,她大胆地回答.

sentences.en: He have the boldness to ask me for money.

sentences.cn: 我对你的大胆感到惊奇.

sentences.en: It is our duty to cultivate the spirit of boldness and fearlessness.
sentences.cn: 我们的责任是培育大无畏的精神.

sentences.en: My boldness is of no use, now that we're alone in this room.
sentences.cn: 到单独只剩两人在一房时,我的大胆, 已经是变得毫无用处了.

sentences.en: Their development still leaves scope for judicial ingenuity and boldness.
sentences.cn: 它们的发展状况仍然给司法上的大胆探索和创造留有余地.

sentences.en: Venus herself supplies resolution and boldness to boys still subject to discipline and the rod.
sentences.cn: 维纳斯向那些仍然受纪律和戒尺约束的男孩子提供了决心和勇气.

sentences.en: What he once took as boldness he will now judge as foolhardiness.
sentences.cn: 他以前认为的勇敢现在觉得是有勇无谋。

sentences.en: Wilson acted with customary boldness in this great challenge to his leadership.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊在这次对他领导的重大挑战中,以其惯有的大胆采取行动.

sentences.en: Your boldness has saved our people, Your Majesty.
sentences.cn: 是你救了我们的人民, 女王陛下.

words.tran_cn: 大胆的，英勇的；黑体的；厚颜无耻的；险峻的
